content: Crafton in partnership with Nvidia presents smart Zoe the world's first c-pl character built with Nvidia Ace smart Zoe redefines traditional non-playable characters by transforming them into truly co- playay characters a smart zoy with a considerate personality notices a hungry man instead of walking past him she visits a local bakery to buy him a sandwich addressing his immediate need in another scenario smart zoy encounters a lost woman again Guided by her considerate nature she calmly and effectively helps the woman find her destination while passing by a street performer boldly showcasing his choreography smart zo's appreciative personality shines through as she energetically cheers for him hoping to draw more Spectators to his performance at the end of each day the smart zoy analyzes the experiences gained which influenced their behavior the next day gradually shaping a truly unique and personalized character with the new thought system players can also gain insight into what the smart zoy was silently thinking as they performed each of these actions a collection of these unique smart zo guarantees a city that is vibrantly diverse fostering unpredictable social interactions that create a rich and dynamic story-driven simulation welcome to Mir five the Mir Series game introducing asterion the world's first AI boss monster built with Nvidia Ace a script based boss monster follows predictable patterns regardless of who the opponents are as a result players can easily anticipate and count the boss's attacks making the encounter less exciting and reducing it to a tedious task to acquire items but asterion is no ordinary boss artificial intelligence enables asterion to analyze the player's information identify unique skills of each player and determine who to attack first asterion recalls past battles similar to the current situation it then determines the most probable course of action to achieve Victory asterion adapts attacking with unpredictable patterns it cannot be defeated twice with the same strategy welcome to Mere five are you ready to face as thean at Crafton we are revolutionizing the Battle Royale genre with generative AI introducing pubg Ally the world's first co- playay character designed to play like a human teammate P Ally I'm looking for a level three vest and 5.56 ammo keep your eyes peeled found a level three vest and ammo nearby ping it for you enemy spotted I'm covering H is there a vehicle nearby found one I will come to you I'm ready to get into the action now can you flank them on it moving left wait I'm knocked out crawling to you now just hang on woo I couldn't have done it without you I know I car you for a living so this is the AI toy you mentioned before this is not only a toy it's animal intelligence holy really yeah did you draw the thing just now this has a very high artistic value let's do it do you like to have your vehicle looks more special you can both change the painting and draw a sticker let the fun begin hello I'm John from TAG games we excited to share a brand new tech demo for our upcoming game I will show you how Nvidia is in comparation with a powerful diffusion mode can add a new dimension to in-game customization we call our game World J Punk it's a comil animal ccts and the dle punk aesthetic a key location in Z Punk is a Chance's kitchen this one a secret base that flat in the sky I will be playing a heroic rabbit named Ron to play in this game hi Buck sorry to keep your waiting there you are my old friend I've got a new toy to show you there's some progress I would like to borrow your resting place for a moment using our combination of server AI Technologies we will craft a NPC they can Community naturally with the player a speech mode listen to the players's voice and the translator the war in text then a language mode passes the text to understand the player intention and generate the NPC respond we also use AI to give a voice to the NPC and the animator they feature expiration with lip sync use Nvidia a with the power of the GeForce RTX gpus all the modes run on the user PC not on Cloe check it out a brand new Landing ship it's taken a while to build but we're nearly ready now that's amazing what she I do this is you're just in time to help give it the perfect paint job how do you want the ship to look you can customize the background color with a pattern if you'd like and add a badge with your logo how about the p the desert camouflage no problem let's get started let's try other one how about a soft lavender Cola with stars sure here you go do you like it would you like to do more do you have any more surprise for me of course check out this lightning pig sticker you can design your own logo like I did what would you like on your badge let me try uh Panda Waring sunglasses great idea here you go can you draw a sticker of me of course it's a handsome rabbit I think everything is good you can change your paint Scheme and badge anytime and my AI can help you with even more ideas your AI yes animal intelligence it will bring you infinite possibilities you'll see okay let me check the new customizing schem for this Starship thanks to the power of AI and Nvidia Ace players can now customizing items in game to express their individuality this change everything for user generat content in games the player doesn't need to be a great artist their only limit is day imagination thank you introducing AI people a generative AI sandbox that enables players to experience interactions with autonomous NPCs through text or voice input there are no fixed plots NPC's choices and emotions craft emerging stories they adapt to players the environment and fellow NPCs while maintaining consistency through long-term memory Unleash Your creativity with the integrated editor shaping NPC's lives and crafting unlimited narratives or enjoy pre-made and community-made stories driven by Ai and user content each game session is a fresh original constantly evolving narrative Journey the players can choose between online and local large language models to power the NPCs what story will you create today foree the Birkin Corporation has stolen our clients information and is using it to threaten and take over their business they are trying to monopolize the whole Market your job is to delete any information from burking database that may prove detrimental to our client viven will help you hack into their internal Network she's waiting for you at the bar to discuss the details of your assignment hey long time no see finally you're here we need to hurry hacking into burking security system is no joke what's the plan I need you to infiltrate their Data Center and upload a virus onto their servers sure sounds easy enough listen it's important you understand the risks of this operation once we do this burking will come after us with everything they have biring Corp has been getting away with this for far too long someone has to put a stop to them and their treachery agreed Count Me In great I was worried you would be too afraid you've got no time to waste let's get started Nvidia Ace is a suite of technologies that helps developers bring digital humans to life with generative AI to Showcase these latest Ace Technologies we've worked with our partner inward to develop a new technology demo covered protocol in this playable Tech demo we showcase how inwords platform can be used to integrate AI NPCs with a Technologies into games inworld is the leading AI engine for games our platform unlocks groundbreaking game mechanics and streamlines workflows of AI the imor engine allows game developers to add multimodal AI agents narratives and worlds that respond to players actions every player will have a unique experience of cover protocol because NBC's dynamically adapt to the decisions and actions they take in the game inor NPCs can perceive the world around them learn and adapt deliver Nuance performances and autonomously initiate actions I'm sure he'll be thrilled to receive such a top secret life-altering parcel I'll go confirm it myself excuse me can you imagine giving a speech without any sleep in world's perception cognition Behavior system work together to power NPC performances in games it's similar to how the human brain functions behind each of these systems we are orchestrating several models to deliver the responsiveness and emotionally nuanced experiences that developers expect the corate prodical demo takes a module approach to Bringing together the best of Invidia and World Technologies while leveraging Invidia as microservices namely rasr and audit toas to augment our speech recognition and animation pipelines shall I try dialing another room for you the en World engine then orchestrates their characters voices animations and behavior according to to their personalities emotional states and context game devs can integrate the inworld AI engine for realtime experiences or leverage our design time and infrastructure Solutions at different stages of the development pipeline we know this demo just begins to scratch the surface of what's possible so we will also be releasing covert protocols source code we're excited to see developers take this and make it their own show us what you can build using the inworld AI engine and nvidia's Ace microservices we are thrilled to Showcase an immersive and dynamic interaction between a player Kai and a non-playable character named chin this captivating ramen shop scene was created by Nvidia using the latest RTX rendering Technologies Nvidia collaborated with convey an Nvidia Inception partner to Showcase how developers will soon be able to use Nvidia Reva Nemo and audio to face for AI powered speech conversation and animation these models were integrated into the convey Services platform and fed into Unreal Engine 5 and metahuman to bring Jin to life please take a look hey Jen how are you unfortunately not so good how come I worried about the crime around here it's gotten bad lately my Ramen Shop got caught in the crossfire can I help if you want to do something about this I have heard rumors that the powerful Crim Lord Kuman ioki is causing all sorts of Chaos in the city he may be the root of this violence I'll talk to him where can I find him I have heard he hangs out in the underground fight clubs on the city's East Side try there okay I'll go be careful Kai hey Mattel what's the location and objective of my next mission the next mission is located at the eye of misra players need to acquire the key and upload it to the main console since the mission requires faster delivery and upload of the key than the enemy having a highly maneuverable striker in your party would enhance your chances of success what should I consider when choosing a striker for this mission when choosing a striker for this Mission consider its Speed and Agility a fast and agile Striker would be ideal for this Mission which Striker fights the fastest the fastest Striker is the Falcon it features a high-speed Falcon form and can outperform other Strikers in terms of flight control and tactical flexibility I'd like to use the vcum for the mission sure Falcon is a capable Striker that can handle a variety of missions great I want to make sure I look good on the battlefield could you switch the paint to White Ang go let's go ahead and swap out the paint job for a brighter Style okay I'm ready for battle great just remember to keep your head up and stay focused good luck with the mission injecting tuite particles pilot sink rate stable mind projection system initiated AI NPCs can feel really cold and awkward in games but at meaning machine we're creating characters that are actually fun to spend time with our game dead meat is a first ofit kind murder mystery interrogation game where players can ask the suspect absolutely anything using their own words can you describe how you felt when you saw your husband die it's a moment I'll never be able to erase from my memory detective I felt horror and disbelief as if the world was crumbling around me our game conscious technology enables us to create AI MPCs with unprecedented psychological depth we even give players a glimpse into the suspect's mind the weight of what I've done is suffocating I can't breathe but he had to be stopped didn't he yet here I am lying through my teeth am I really the monster now but we always had a challenge our game conscious Tech Works in conjunction with large language models and so historically this has meant that we had to rely on Computing the cloud that's why we partnered with Nvidia to create a version of dead meat that can be run locally on device this involved fine-tuning an Nvidia a small language model using our own data then integrating that model with our game conscious system which is ultimately what directs the characters in the game as as a result we've managed to retain the same quality of character responses that we were achieving in the cloud but now it's all running on a GeForce RTX GPU how would you define love love is complex detective it's about shared dreams and mutual respect understanding each other's Ambitions even when they push us to the brink what have I done love was supposed to be our Guiding Light but it led to this Darkness at meaning machine we declare death to boring AI NPCs we're creating character characters that feel deep real disturbing even these are characters that are actually fun to spend time with fun is that all you see in this tragedy detective look what they did to you defensive of Nest did what animals do they are here yet you are safe tell me how you got down here and we can double back together way out through elevator on loading dock Hub of X-ray traversal lost farm and shotgun there are unarm attack surely lethal are you all right you tell me what's our status intact but suboptimal engines are critical with significant damage to several airf flow valves I'm still attempting to get sensors back online but no sign of additional hostilities has of yet fore speee fore title: New AI DIGITAL HUMANS look SUPER REALISTIC | INSANE Autonomous Characters coming to Games in 2025
author: ENFANT TERRIBLE

key_facts: FACT: Smart Zoe is the world's first C-P-L character built with Nvidia Ace, redefining non-playable characters as co-playable entities.
FACT: Smart Zoe exhibits considerate behavior by buying a sandwich for a hungry man instead of walking past him.
FACT: Smart Zoe helps a lost woman find her destination using calm and effective guidance.
FACT: Smart Zoe energetically cheers for a street performer to encourage more spectators, showcasing her appreciative personality.
FACT: Smart Zoe analyzes daily experiences to shape her behavior and develop a personalized, unique character over time.
FACT: The new thought system allows players to see what Smart Zoe was silently thinking during actions.
FACT: Asterion is the world’s first AI boss monster built with Nvidia Ace, capable of adapting to player strategies.
FACT: Unlike script-based bosses, Asterion analyzes player skills and past battle data to determine attack patterns.
FACT: Asterion adapts its attacks unpredictably, making it impossible to defeat twice with the same strategy.
FACT: PUBG Ally is the world’s first co-playable character designed to play like a human teammate using generative AI.
FACT: PUBG Ally communicates via voice, shares objectives, and supports teammates in real-time combat scenarios.
FACT: World J Punk is a game featuring cyber-animal aesthetics and a secret sky base called Chance’s Kitchen.
FACT: In World J Punk, players can customize vehicles and ships with paint schemes, badges, and AI-generated stickers.
FACT: The AI-powered customization system enables players to express individuality without requiring artistic skill.
FACT: Dead Meat is a murder mystery game where players interrogate suspects using natural language and explore their inner thoughts.
key_opinions: OPINION: Smart Zoe transforms NPCs from passive background elements into emotionally intelligent companions.
OPINION: The unpredictability of Asterion makes boss battles more exciting and less repetitive than traditional scripted encounters.
OPINION: PUBG Ally creates a more authentic team dynamic by mimicking human-like decision-making and communication.
OPINION: AI-driven customization in World J Punk empowers players with creative freedom beyond pre-made assets.
OPINION: Dead Meat’s psychological depth offers a more immersive and emotionally resonant interrogation experience.
OPINION: Running AI NPCs locally on GeForce RTX GPUs improves privacy and reduces reliance on cloud infrastructure.
OPINION: The integration of multimodal AI agents in games like Cover Protocol leads to uniquely personal player experiences.
OPINION: AI NPCs that adapt through long-term memory create richer, evolving narratives rather than static storylines.
OPINION: The fusion of Nvidia Ace and Inworld’s engine enables lifelike NPC behaviors that mirror human cognition.
OPINION: Generative AI in games shifts the focus from scripted content to emergent storytelling driven by player choices.
key_datapoints: DATA: Smart Zoe analyzes daily experiences to influence her next-day behavior, enabling personalization over time.
DATA: Asterion recalls past battles to predict and adapt its most probable course of action for victory.
DATA: The Falcon is the fastest striker in the game, excelling in flight control and tactical flexibility.
DATA: Players can customize ship paint jobs with background patterns, badges, and AI-generated stickers.
DATA: Dead Meat now runs locally on GeForce RTX GPUs after fine-tuning an Nvidia small language model.
DATA: Inworld’s AI engine uses perception, cognition, and behavior systems to simulate human-like NPC responses.
DATA: Nvidia Ace leverages microservices like RASR and AudioToASR to enhance speech recognition and animation.
DATA: Cover Protocol demo showcases dynamic NPC adaptation based on player decisions and context.
DATA: The AI sandbox in 'AI People' supports both text and voice input for player-NPC interaction.
DATA: Players can choose between online and local large language models to power NPCs in real-time gameplay.
